titleStmt.title: The Proceedings at the Sessions for London & Middlesex, holden at the Old Bailey beginning on Wednesday the sixteenth of July, 1679 being the condemnation of the notorious coyners and many other too common malefactors : with the number of persons condemned to die, and their respective facts : as also of those that were burnt in the hand, or otherwise to be punished : and likewise the tryals of Sir George Wakeman, Mr. Corker, Provincial of the Benedictine monks, Mr. Rumly, and Mr. Marshal.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Quarter Sessions of the Peace (London)
